pages.title: Schematics
pages.text: If you gain trust with a summoned dwarf, overtime they may reveal secrets only known to the dwarfs.

pages.title: Gem Transmutation
pages.text: With the knowledge of gem transmutation you can easily make high quality fey gems.

pages.title: Gem Transmutation
pages.text: Requires 50 - 150 mana stored into the dwarven Anvil.

pages.title: Recipe
pages.text: Either requires 5 Lesser, 5 Greater or 5 Shiny Fey Gems to transmute to their superior versions. Make sure the schematics for gem transmutation are present for the Dwarf Blacksmith to receive instructions and start crafting.

pages.title: Fey Altar
pages.text: A Fey Altar allows you to summon Fey, if you know the correct summoning incantation.

pages.title: Fey Altar
pages.text: Requires 1000 mana stored into the dwarven Anvil.

pages.title: Recipe
pages.text: The Ingredients are 1 Lesser Fey Gem, 2 Gold Ingots, 1 Heavy Weighted Pressure Plate and 1 Brilliant Fey Gem. Make sure the schematics for the fey altar are present for the Dwarf Blacksmith to receive instructions and start crafting.
